name: Prado Parking City Adventure
description:
Prado Parking City Adventure is smart game of challenging driving missions. Hard rough roads to test the driving skills. Straight forward Prado jeep driving on the city streets. Wide paths a lot of room for the jeep driver to steer towards the destination. With multiple control options, now you can get the best driving experience. Hurdles and obstacles on the way will slow the journey down. Classic Prado jeep racing towards the goal in a crowded city is amazing.
Prado Parking City Adventure features:
• Multiple levels of classic parking skill show and excruciating Prado mission of driving.
• Shiny Prado vehicles with realistic simulation
• Extra ordinary simulation and animation added in the Prado Parking City Adventure
• Realistic controls on the sharp turns
• Keep the Prado Jeep Health intact until you reach the destination
• Reach the destination without damaging the vehicle.
• Don’t crash and burn the vehicle
• Change camera view to master the parking skill and tasks.
